ygData.subject: RE: another monk armor question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the going rate on xegony is 2pp per AC of the item....some might try to charge 3pp per.....but you should be able to talk them down... gunslinger
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dizzy J. [mailto:dizzyj@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 10:08 AM
> To: eq-monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] another monk armor question
>
>
> From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
> I'm a freeport lvl 10 monk, and my entire armor constists of netted
> gloves, and my guild tunic. I was thinking about heading down to the
> outside of guk to buy some mesh off of the people hunting there.
>
> how much can I expect to pay for peices of mesh?
>
> thanks
>
the going rate on xegony is 2pp per AC of the item....some might try to
charge 3pp per.....but you should be able to talk them down...


gunslinger
